mapper.select: select param.id as id, param.group_id as groupId, gup.group_name as groupName, param.parameter_name as parameterName, param.param_key as 'key', param.param_value as value, if(param.enable,1,0) as enable, param.`desc` as 'desc', param.created_by as createdById, param.created_time as createdTime, param.updated_time as updatedTime, param.updated_by as upadtedById from pla_sys_param_setting param left join pla_sys_group_setting gup on param.group_id = gup.id and gup.dr = 0 where param.dr=0 and param.id=#{id}
